tagline: Air traffic control for family life — no double bookings, no forgotten permission slips
pros: Prevents scheduling conflicts before they happen
Tracks fairness in logistics labor distribution
Builds systems that handle disruption gracefully
Proactive weekly previews keep everyone informed
cons: Manages schedules, not the family dynamics behind them
Can't solve overcommitment — that requires saying no
Needs buy-in from all family members to work well

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
